view_definition_query: select slt.idslumptests, slt.value, slt.date, slt.loadid, slt.idprojects, pr.name as projectname, slt.idsuppliers, supp.name as suppliername, slt.idaccounts, acc.username, slt.idcompositions, com.name as compositionname, com.tholdmax, com.tholdmin from consulgal.slumptests as slt left join consulgal.projects as pr on pr.idprojects = slt.idprojects left join consulgal.suppliers as supp on supp.idsuppliers = slt.idsuppliers left join consulgal.accounts as acc on acc.idaccounts = slt.idaccounts left join consulgal.compositions as com on com.idcompositions = slt.idcompositions
